title: Healthcare Website Design
description:
Be found, stand out and attract your best patients with Patientli.

We’re a new kind of dental marketing service that’s been thoughtfully designed from the ground up to serve the all of the marketing needs of growing practices. Our stunning designs and researched-backed marketing approaches help generate results for growth-minded dental businesses of all sizes.

You’re 14 days away from a new website

Most dental website providers take months to launch a website. With Patientli, you can have a beautiful new website and brand in just 2 weeks.

Managed for you

With Patientli, you’re fully supported by our excellent design & development team, so you won’t be left to figure out how to update and maintain your website on your own.

Unlimited free updates

Need to change out a team member or add a new service? Just send us a message. We don’t charge for updates or limit the amount of changes you can make.

Content & images included

Top-performing websites require a surprising amount of informational content. Whether you want to bring along some of your own or need everything written for you, we’ve got you covered.

Brand design included

You can’t have a great website without a great brand, which is why every Patientli site comes with free access to a modern, beautiful brand kit that can be used to refresh your image.

We’ll keep you up to date

When you subscribe to a Patientli plan, we’ll automatically keep your site up to date with search engine guidelines and modern standards, including those around mobile optimization and accessibility.

Find your practice’s new Look today.

Explore website layouts and more with Patientli Looks-- a shortcut to world-class branding for dental practices. Available designs for logos, websites, marketing materials and much more.

Find your look

Built from the ground up to attract more patients.

Our data-backed designs do more than just look good

Each new website we create is informed by experience —  the data collected from our other customers, their top-ranking pages and the sections where website visitors convert into new patients. We’ve distilled this experience into a winning formula that we apply to every website we build.

Great for patients + great for search engines = great for you

Patientli’s websites are equally appealing to patients and search engines, balancing the clear and compelling messaging that convinces patients with the formatting and technical details that search engines need to deliver top rankings, traffic and appointment bookings.

Patientli sites are better by design.

Head-turning, scroll-stopping custom designs.

Patientli’s websites and brands are designed to resonate with patients, grab their attention and convince them that you’re an option worth considering. Our creative team hand-selects the images, colors, fonts and content for all of our websites and brands ensuring you make an excellent first impression and not missed in the feed.

Customized just for you.

Our unique design process delivers beautiful, unique websites and brands faster than ever. We mix your input with our library of brands and starter designs in order to arrive at top-quality designs that are unique to your practice and personality.

Grow your practice without outgrowing your website.

Patientli’s websites are built to seamlessly integrate with all of our marketing plans. Whether you’re a new practice who wants to start small and add services as you grow or an established practice that’s ready to get more out of their existing patient base and take over the town, you can feel confident that your website will never hold you back.

Sign up for a Patientli plan today, have a custom website in 2 weeks or less.

See pricing & plans

Includes everything you need for a beautiful, effective website.

  • Home Page
  • About Page
  • Provider Profile Pages
  • Service Landing Pages
  • Office/Locations Pages
  • Contact/Booking Pages
  • Insurance Acceptance Page
  • Financial Policies Page
  • Blog Page & Posts
  • Mobile Optimization
  • SEO Friendly Structure
  • Google Analytics Integration
  • Google Business Integration
  • Booking Portal Integration
  • Patient Portal Integration
  • Patient Forms Integration
shortDescription: Enhance your online image with Patientli’s healthcare website design services. We build responsive, user-friendly sites that showcase your practice, streamline bookings, and convert visitors into loyal patients.

title: Search Engine Optimization
description:
Be found when patients search.

Whether they're trying to understand their symptoms or looking for a new provider, today's patients use search engines to do the job. With Patientli on your side, you can do more to ensure your practice will be visible for the searches that matter to you.

Strategies tailored to you

No one-size-fits-all SEO here. Patientli achieves better results by developing SEO strategies that are built around your website’s strengths, weaknesses and competitive environment.

Achieve lasting visibility

SEO is about more than just rankings — it’s a strategic investment in your practice’s future that builds competitive advantage over time. We craft strategies that create long-lasting organic visibility, insulating your practice from rising ads costs and competition.

Stand out for the services you offer.

Attract more of the patients you want with strategies that gear visibility towards the services you specialize in or those with the highest production value.

An optimized page for each service

Research shows that the highest-value patients know what they’re looking for. We create and optimize a dedicated website page for each service you offer so you can appear for.

Boost your results with Ads

Generate results faster, gain more control over your new patient numbers or squeeze out the competition by supplementing an SEO strategy with Google Ads. Available in our Growth package and higher.
shortDescription: Boost your practice’s visibility with Patientli’s expert SEO services. We optimize your website to rank higher in search results, attract more patients, and ensure your services are easily found by those who need them.

title: Digital Advertising Management
description:
Supplement your search visibility with Google Ads.

Search advertising is a great way to supplement the visibility achieved by SEO campaigns to reach more patients who are actively looking for a new provider.

Integrated with your SEO strategy

A paid search ads strategy can work to fill visibility gaps for services and keywords that you aren’t ranking for organically or double down to push out competitors.

Reach new audiences with social and display ads.

Many patients aren’t actively seeking a dental care provider but might be soon. Reach them with ads to convince, convert and build brand recognition.

Build your audience with social ads

Enhance the reach of your social content. We manage advertising strategies on Instagram and Facebook to grow your audience of existing and potential patients.

Good looks come standard

You ad creative and visuals are always professionally crafted by Patientli’s design team and are based on your brand and unique value adds. The result is advertising that’s attractive, authentic and always on-brand.
shortDescription: Reach more patients with Patientli’s expert digital advertising management. We design and optimize campaigns across platforms like Google Ads and social media to maximize ROI and drive patient growth.

title: Brand Design
description:
Patientli Looks are a shortcut to consistent and memorable branding, across every patient touchpoint.

The creative process can be daunting for busy healthcare business owners. To solve this, we created Looks– unique, customizable dental branding starting points that feel at home in healthcare. Use one exactly as-is or request specific edits to take a brand that’s almost perfect to one that’s uniquely yours. Looks can include the following resources:

Website

Nowadays, your brand and website are inseparable. As the first impression most patients will have of your business and the most important asset to your digital marketing strategy, beautifully-branded websites are the foundation of all of our marketing plans.

Logo Design or Refresh

Need a new logo or dental branding solution for your business? Browse our brand kits to find a style you like and our team will customize it with your business name. Already have a logo? Our team can refresh it to more seamlessly fit with your brand aesthetic of choice.

Business Cards and Print Materials

Great dental branding is consistent across digital and physical mediums, so we include designs for business cards, postcards, flyers, and paperwork with all of our brands.

Professionally-Selected Colors & Fonts

Our design team hand picks beautiful colors and typefaces for each of the brands we create. These foundational elements ensure a consistent and professional appearance across any material your brand might appear on.

Signage

Find your practice’s new Look today.

Patientli Looks are a shortcut to world-class branding for dental practices. Designs for logos, websites, marketing materials and much more. Find your look

Patientli makes great branding as easy as 1,2,3.

1. Find a look you like

Browse our library of brand kits to find the style that feels like it best represents your business. Our beautiful, professionally-designed kits range from bold and vibrant to traditional and sophisticated, ensuring you’ll find one you love.

2. Personalize your look with our design team

Love the look of Lumena but wish it used blues instead of greens, or a different font? You can optionally make small style changes to your favorite kit with the help of our design team so that it truly feels like yours.

3. Go impress patients

Our design team will apply your perfect brand to all of the marketing assets included in your plan so you can begin impressing patients with a brand that matches your quality of care.

With looks for every style, it’s easy to find one that fits for you.

Browse looks
shortDescription: Transform your practice’s identity with Patientli’s comprehensive brand design services. We craft compelling logos, color palettes, and messaging that reflect your unique values and resonate with your target audience. Build trust and stand out in the competitive healthcare market.

title: Content Marketing
description:
Give patients the information they need. Boost treatment acceptance.

We believe treatment acceptance comes down to a few things: the patient’s understanding of why a treatment is necessary and how it will benefit them, their level of trust in their provider, and whether concerns or obstacles to treatment have been removed or addressed. 

With Patientli’s educational content marketing, your website can help patients find the information they need to feel confident in their treatment choices, both before and after the appointment. We create informational pages about each service you offer along with blog posts that answer the questions that patients most commonly want to know before accepting treatment, powered by search engine data.

Educate and empower, before and after the appointment.

3+ related posts for every service

Take your pick of topics from our library of content related to each service you offer. We’ll tailor the content to your needs and preferences and specific treatment protocols.

Powered by search data

We’ve reviewed the data on what patients search for when considering treatments and have created a wealth of educational content designed to answer their questions and address their concerns.

Build education into your whole strategy.

Educate while building rapport with social

Personalize your practice marketing and build trust with a social strategy that introduces current and prospective patients to your team and provides bite-sized patient education on conditions and treatments.

Build trust and credibility with guest blogging

We help doctors contribute to trade publications across the web, which helps to signal their topical authority to patients while serving as a powerful booster to search engine marketing strategies.

Personalize treatment conversations with email

Send email that’s relevant and tailored to each patient’s treatment plan. Provide helpful post-op instructions or educational materials geared to gently nudge patients towards care acceptance without increasing your team’s workload.
shortDescription: Elevate your online presence with Patientli’s content marketing solutions. From engaging blogs to SEO-driven copy, we create valuable content that attracts patients, boosts search rankings, and positions your practice as an industry leader.

title: Social Media Management
description:
Educate your patients with on-brand images and carousels.

Our social marketing services are designed to reach patients and their connections through powerful awareness-based channels like Instagram and Facebook.

Managed social, just for you

Work with your social media manager to customize a quarterly social media calendar, aligned with the services you offer and integrated with your broader marketing strategy for maximum effect.

Top-quality social content

Pick from our constantly updated library of educational carousels, helpful facts, review reposts and team member intros designed to help educate and engage your audience about the services you offer, all beautifully styled in your brand aesthetic.

Engage and build trust with reels and videos.

Take advantage of the reels and stories formats on Instagram and Facebook without having to regularly record content.

You bring the expertise, we’ll handle the legwork

Recording clips one by one is a lot of work, and you’re busy. Instead, Patientli records interviews your team about their approach, treatment philosophy and background and edits the conversation down to reel or story format to get lots of content out of a single chat.

Grow your patient base and network

Recording clips one by one is a lot of work, and you’re busy. Instead, Patientli records interviews your team about their approach, treatment philosophy and background and edits the conversation down to reel or story format to get lots of content out of a single chat.
shortDescription: Connect with patients through Patientli’s social media management solutions. We craft engaging content, manage your profiles, and foster meaningful interactions to build a strong online community and drive patient engagement.

title: Review and Reputation Management
description:
Generate more reviews, rank higher on Google.

Your business’ number of reviews and average rating are ranking signals that Google takes into account when displaying search results. Patientli helps you get more reviews and harness the power of positive feedback for your practice.

Send post-appointment patient review requests

Patientli integrates with your patient communication software to ask every patient for a post-appointment review.

Actively manage patient feedback

When a patient leaves a positive review on your online profiles, we thank them by name. In the rare event of negative feedback, we help you manage the review or reply professionally to let other readers know the business did its part.

Review monitoring and management.

Monitor and manage Google, Yelp & Healthgrades

We manage all major reviews sites to ensure your business is putting its best foot forward everywhere it appears on the web.

We manage office and practitioner profiles

Patientli manages your office’s reviews as well as all of the practitioners who work there, ensuring all patient feedback is managed and addressed.
shortDescription: Boost patient trust with Patientli’s review and reputation management solutions. Our proactive approach ensures positive reviews shine, negative feedback is addressed, and your practice’s online reputation thrives.

title: Answer Engine Optimization
description:
Get recommended in AI search. Attract your perfect patients.

When patients turn to AI assistants for a dentist or doctor, they chat with it the way they would with a trusted friend-- providing tons of context about the service they need and the credentials, amenities or coverage they want. Because they provide this extra context, they tend to really trust the results. Patientli’s AEO service helps ensure you get mentioned when your best-fit patients use AI answer engines to search.

Get more patients who are ready to book

We make sure AIs understand the important details about your practice so they can include them in results or correctly answer patient follow-up questions. The result is fewer inquiries from “window shoppers” that waste valuable front desk resources with basic questions and more inquiries from patients who are ready to book.

Stay ahead of the competition

AI is sure to change the landscape of search. Practices that adapt early stand to gain the biggest advantages. Patientli is committed to keeping clients on the cutting edge.

Find out what AI knows about your practice, free and instantly.

Knowledge is power. And if AI can’t access information about your practice, it’s less likely to recommend you and more likely to make errors when it does. Understand what AI knows about your practice today with Patientli’s free AI Knowledge Snapshot. Get your free snapshot

Patientli’s AEO service includes everything you need to win AI search and stay ahead of the competition.

Patient Intent Mapping

We uncover details about your ideal patients and identify the unique selling points about your practice that will entice them to book and return for your care again and again.

Entity Optimization

We structure your website content and schema to clearly define your specialties, services, providers, insurance accepted, and location—so AI models can more easily “understand” and recommend you.

Conversational Content Creation

We write and optimize pages to mirror real questions your patients are asking—formatted in ways answer engines can easily parse and surface.

AI visibility testing

We test your website across tools like ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini to track when, where, and how you show up—so we can adjust content and structure accordingly.

Cross-channel knowledge optimization

We ensure your practice details (like hours, insurance, etc.) are synced across Google Business, review sites, healthcare directories, and third-party databases and reviews sites, which many AI models use to verify and rank answers.

AEO x SEO

With AI engines partly relying on traditional search to surface information, it’s still as relevant as ever. Patientli’s AEO and SEO plans are designed to supplement one another, helping you stand out in today’s multimodal search environment.
